MajorClaims.MC1: I would prefer to have my own job
MajorClaims.MC2: I would like to run my own business to control my own time, and to earn more money based on my noble ideas

Claims.C1: time is the more valuable thing, which I have in my life
Claims.C2: I never have been rich in my life
Claims.C3: many people are not eager to work for themselves

Premises.P1: By having my own business, I can manage my own time
Premises.P2: could work whenever I want, or I do not need to give reasons to my boss for a delay
Premises.P3: I can arrange time to travel when I would like
Premises.P4: I can work long hours for earning more money
Premises.P5: the most important reason for me to be self-employed is the sense of free
Premises.P6: If I work for other people, I have to give my ideas to employers cheaply
Premises.P7: my salary is not dramatically changed
Premises.P8: I can earn more money based on my creativity and personal ideas
Premises.P9: earning money is the fundamental reason that why people work
Premises.P10: The amount of money is always the most important criterion for everyone to choose a job
